page.title: 09Dedham - The Talbooth
page.content: The Talbooth is a restored 15th Century building by the river at the site of the tollgate on the road from Colchester to Ipswich. It is an internationally famous restaurant used by actors,actresses and big business men as well as tourists. Some people even arrive by helicopter. A marquee is sometimes erected for wedding receptions.It is owned by Gerald Millsom who also owns the Maison Talbooth an exclusive country house hotel and the Dedham Vale hotel and Terrace Restaurant. He employs over 100 people including 10 cooks at the Talbooth alone. He offers the very best of English and some French cooking and 180 different wines including English ones.
